title: Greeff (Richard)
body: Doctor of philosophy and medicine. Author of Reise nach den Canarischen Inseln, Bonn, 1868, and Madeira und die Canarischen Inseln, Marburgi, 1872. The first of these writings also deals with the island of Madeira.

Richard Greeff: Doctor of philosophy and medicine, author of writings about the Canary Islands and Madeira

1868: Publication of Reise nach den Canarischen Inseln
1872: Publication of Madeira und die Canarischen Inseln
